channel.title: Poems on My Obsidian Site
channel.description: Recent content in Poems on My Obsidian Site

item.description:
grows though hate, grows through challenge, grows through the people who cannot understand this with their mind grows as the branches of the darkness intertwine my love grows with this land as my hearts set of fire, my love grows through your love like the voice of a choir

love moves though me like you are the wind ill move for you, Ill take it in,

a future where everyones famous the only reason we admire fame is because it means someone came to earth, and did what nobody else could do. They did themselves and shared something we hadn’t yet experienced. This is not going to be a very big deal in the future, this is the goal we aim for, a world where everyone has permission to do themselves and the world supports their growth.
